original_title: カラミざかり 有坂深雪 枢木あおい
overview: A complete live-action version of the popular comic by Airi Katsura! I showed you a video of an AV actress similar to Riho Iida, who is unrequited love by her best friend Takashi. It was found by Tomono Niiyama, a girl friend of Iida, and Takanari was worried that Iida would destroy it. Later, Iida and his friends asked me about Takashi's purchase of Onaho, and this time the three of us went to Takashi's house to see Onaho. Takashi, who was ill-mannered, started having sex with Tomono, and even robbed Riho's virginity in front of her.
title: A Full Bloom Fuck Fest Miyuki Arisaka Aoi Kururugi
